thread.title: Zicix Corporation in Talks to Acquire Smart Chip

author: cnbc.com
title: Zicix Corporation in Talks to Acquire Smart Chip

organizations.name: zicix corporation in talks to acquire smart chip

text:
CARSON CITY, Nev., April 23, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- via OTC PR WIRE--(OTC Pink:ZICX) – Zicix Corporation Chairman and CEO William Petty has begun negotiating for the acquisition of smart card technology (oftentimes known as “chip” technology) which provides multiple layers of security.
With acquisition of smart card technology, the Zicx Smart Card will include an embedded chip making it nearly impossible to duplicate a stolen card. The same technology includes e-commerce safety features providing additional fraud protection when shopping online.
In making today’s announcement, Mr Petty emphasized, “I want Zicix Smart Card clients to know that their cards can be safely used to preload personal cash or when receiving direct deposits; they can be totally comfortable using their cards in all financial aspects of life. They can even earn, collect and redeem points from retailer’s loyalty programs and manufacturer’s coupons.”
About Zicix Corporation (ZICX:OTCMKTS US). Originally founded as a service provider to the Healthcare industry, the Zicix Corporation has recently been restructured with the intention of acquiring and developing technology applications designed for service companies in consumer, retail and other industries.
